Articles.Content:
Harro, this be mah current flagship, teh AwesomeSauce Mk I! 8) pics are below

[dont know how to make the pics show here, so until then, nothing ]

i do use a custom part of my own, just a config edit of another mod, this is REQUIRED, although if anyone could help tell em what mods i have installed for this ship to work, that would be AWESOME

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

The F1 key will take a screen shot and place it in a folder called \screenshots\ in your game folder.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
[The Screenshot key is, by default, F1. Alternatively, Print Screen -> Paste into your preferred graphics program. F1 is easier, though]

[The Screenshot key is, by default, F1. Alternatively, Print Screen -> Paste into your preferred graphics program. F1 is easier, though]

Gah, Had a serious brainfart on that one. You're right, I could have sworn it was the Print Screen key. Post corrected.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
Print screen always just take's a picture of my desktop for me whenever I use KSP. Even if I'm IN KSP when I do it.

Print screen always just take's a picture of my desktop for me whenever I use KSP. Even if I'm IN KSP when I do it.

Yes, but it only places it on the clipboard, not directly to a file. Some people have difficulty with opening paint, pasting the image and saving the file. Especially if you need to take a quick series of screenshots.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
